summary.span: 发现方法的属性并提供对方法元数据的访问。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a method and provides access to method metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示类型的方法。The class represents a method of a type. 您可以使用 对象获取有关对象所表示的方法的信息，以及调用方法。You can use a object to obtain information about the method that the object represents and to invoke the method. 例如：For example: - 可以通过检索 、 、 和属性的值来确定该方法的可见性 。You can determine the method's visibility by retrieving the values of the , , , and properties. - 可以通过检索属性的值 或调用方法来发现应用于方法的特性 。You can discover what attributes are applied to the method by retrieving the value of the property or calling the method. - 通过检索和属性的值，可以确定方法是泛型方法、开放式构造泛型方法还是封闭式构造泛型方法 。You can determine whether the method is a generic method, an open constructed generic method, or a closed constructed generic method, by retrieving the values of the and properties. - 可以从 方法和 、 和属性获取有关方法的参数和返回类型的信息 。You can get information about the method's parameters and return type from the method and the , , and properties. - 可以通过调用方法对类实例执行方法 。You can execute a method on a class instance by calling the method. - 通过调用方法，可以实例化 表示泛型方法定义的构造泛型方法的对象 。You can instantiate a object that represents a constructed generic method from one that represents a generic method definition by calling the method. 可以 通过调用或方法来实例化 实例 ，也可以通过调用 表示泛型方法定义的对象的方法来实例化实例。You can instantiate a instances by calling the or method, or by calling the method of a object that represents a generic method definition. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

member this.ContainsGenericParameters : bool

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示泛型方法是否包含未分配的泛型类型参数。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a generic method contains unassigned generic type parameters.

value.span: 如果当前 包含未分配的泛型类型参数，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the current contains unassigned generic type parameters; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要调用泛型方法，在方法本身的类型参数中或在任何封闭类型中都不能有泛型类型定义或开放式构造类型。To invoke a generic method, there must be no generic type definitions or open constructed types in the type arguments of the method itself, or in any enclosing types. 进行递归确定可能很困难。Making this recursive determination can be difficult. 为方便起见，若要减少出现错误的可能性， `ContainsGenericParameters` 属性提供了一种标准方法来区分已关闭的构造方法（可以调用）和开放构造方法（不能）。For convenience, and to reduce the chance of error, the `ContainsGenericParameters` property provides a standard way to distinguish between closed constructed methods, which can be invoked, and open constructed methods, which cannot. 如果 `ContainsGenericParameters` 属性返回 `true` ，则不能调用该方法。If the `ContainsGenericParameters` property returns `true`, the method cannot be invoked. `ContainsGenericParameters`属性以递归方式搜索类型参数。The `ContainsGenericParameters` property searches recursively for type parameters. 例如，它 `true` 为开放类型中的任何方法返回 `A` ，即使方法本身不是泛型也是如此。For example, it returns `true` for any method in an open type `A`, even though the method itself is not generic. 将此与属性的行为进行对比 ，这将 `false` 为此类方法返回。Contrast this with the behavior of the property, which returns `false` for such a method. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，为直接或间接的基类（用该实例表示的方法首先在此类中声明）上的方法返回 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the object for the method on the direct or indirect base class in which the method represented by this instance was first declared.

returns.span: 表示此方法第一个实现的 对象。

span.span: A object for the first implementation of this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回类层次结构中指定方法的第一个定义。The method returns the first definition of the specified method in the class hierarchy. 您可以通过在返回的对象上检索属性的值来确定该方法的第一个定义的类型 。You can determine the type on which the first definition of the method is found by retrieving the value of the property on the returned object. 方法的行为如下所示：The method behaves as follows: - 如果当前 对象表示接口实现，则 方法返回当前 对象。If the current object represents an interface implementation, the method returns the current object. - 如果当前 对象表示重写基类中的虚拟定义的方法，则该方法将 返回 表示虚拟定义的对象。If the current object represents a method that overrides a virtual definition in a base class, the method returns a object that represents the virtual definition. - 如果当前 对象表示使用 `new` c # 中的关键字或 `Shadows` (Visual Basic 中的关键字 `newslot` （如 [通用类型系统](/dotnet/standard/base-types/common-type-system)) 中所述）指定的方法，则该 方法将返回当前 对象。If the current object represents a method that is specified with the `new` keyword in C# or the `Shadows` keyword in Visual Basic (as in `newslot`, as described in [Common Type System](/dotnet/standard/base-types/common-type-system)), the method returns the current object. - 如果当前的 对象表示 (的继承方法，则当前方法不提供其自己的实现) ， 方法返回一个 对象，该对象表示类层次结构中的最小方法。If the current object represents an inherited method (that is, the current method does not provide its own implementation), the method returns a object that represents the lowest method in the class hierarchy. 例如，如果 `Base.ToString` 重写 `Object.ToString` 和 `Derived.ToString` 重写 `Base.ToString` ，则 对表示的对象调用方法将 `Derived.ToString` 返回表示的 对象 `Object.ToString` 。For example, if `Base.ToString` overrides `Object.ToString`, and `Derived.ToString` overrides `Base.ToString`, calling the method on a object that represents `Derived.ToString` returns a object that represents `Object.ToString`. - 如果当前 对象表示的方法不在任何基类中，则该 方法返回当前 对象。If the current object represents a method that is not present in any base class, the method returns the current object. 您可以通过调用方法来确定当前方法是否重写基类中的方法 。You can determine whether the current method overrides a method in a base class by calling the method. 下面的示例实现实现 `IsOverride` 此功能的方法。The following example implements an `IsOverride` method that does this. [!code-csharp[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/IsOverride1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/IsOverride1.vb#2)] 调用 `GetBaseDefinition` 方法：To call the `GetBaseDefinition` method: 1. 获取一个 对象，该对象表示包含属性) (类或结构的类型。Get a object that represents the type (the class or structure) that contains the property. 如果使用 (类型的实例的对象) ，则可以调用其 方法。If you are working with an object (an instance of a type), you can call its method. 否则，可以使用 c # 运算符或 Visual Basic [GetType](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator) 运算符，如示例中所示。Otherwise, you can use the C# operator or the Visual Basic [GetType](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/operators/gettype-operator) operator, as the example illustrates. 2. 获取一个 对象，该对象表示你感兴趣的方法。Get a object that represents the method in which you're interested. 为此，可以从方法获取所有方法的数组， 然后循环访问数组中的元素，也可以 通过调用 方法并指定方法名称来直接检索表示方法的对象。You can do this by getting an array of all methods from the method and then iterating the elements in the array, or you can retrieve the object that represents the method directly by calling the method and specifying the method name. 3. 调用 方法可获取 表示基方法定义的对象的值。Call the method to get the value of the object that represents the base method definition. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法的行为 。The following example demonstrates the behavior of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetBaseDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/cs/getbasedefinition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetBaseDefinition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.methodinfo.getbasedefinition/vb/getbasedefinition1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 返回 对象的数组，这些对象表示泛型方法的类型实参或泛型方法定义的类型形参。

span.span: Returns an array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

returns.span: 对象的数组，这些对象表示泛型方法的类型变量或泛型方法定义的类型参数。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the type arguments of a generic method or the type parameters of a generic method definition.

returns.span: 如果当前方法不是泛型方法，则返回空数组。

span.span: Returns an empty array if the current method is not a generic method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回数组的元素按它们出现在泛型方法的类型参数列表中的顺序排列。The elements of the returned array are in the order in which they appear in the list of type parameters for the generic method. - 如果当前方法是封闭式构造方法 (即， 属性返回 `false`) ，则方法返回的数组 包含已分配给泛型方法定义的泛型类型参数的类型。If the current method is a closed constructed method (that is, the property returns `false`), the array returned by the method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic method definition. - 如果当前方法是泛型方法定义，则数组包含类型参数。If the current method is a generic method definition, the array contains the type parameters. - 如果当前方法是开放构造方法 (即，则 属性将返回 `true`) 在此方法中，已将特定类型分配给某些类型参数，并已将封闭泛型类型的类型参数分配给其他类型参数，数组同时包含类型参数和类型参数。If the current method is an open constructed method (that is, the property returns `true`) in which specific types have been assigned to some type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types have been assigned to other type parameters, the array contains both types and type parameters. 使用 属性将它们区分开来。Use the property to tell them apart. 有关此方案的演示，请参阅属性的代码示例 。For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example for the property. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取泛型方法的类型实参并显示它们。The following code example shows how to get the type arguments of a generic method and display them. 此示例摘自为方法提供的一个更大的示例 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#8)]

span.span: This method is not supported.
Reflection and Generic Types

span.span: Introduction to Generics (C# Programming Guide)

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象表示可从其构造当前方法的泛型方法定义。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

returns.span: 一个 对象，表示可从其构造当前方法的泛型方法定义。

span.span: A object representing a generic method definition from which the current method can be constructed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型方法定义是可以从中构造方法的模板。A generic method definition is a template from which methods can be constructed. 例如，从泛型方法定义 `T M(T t)` (用 c # 语法表示; `Function M(Of T)(ByVal tVal As T) As T` 在 Visual Basic 中) 可以在 `int M(int t)` Visual Basic) 中构造和调用方法 (`Function M(Of Integer)(ByVal tVal As Integer) As Integer` 。For example, from the generic method definition `T M(T t)` (expressed in C# syntax; `Function M(Of T)(ByVal tVal As T) As T` in Visual Basic) you can construct and invoke the method `int M(int t)` (`Function M(Of Integer)(ByVal tVal As Integer) As Integer` in Visual Basic). 给定 表示此构造方法的对象， 方法返回泛型方法定义。Given a object representing this constructed method, the method returns the generic method definition. 如果两个构造方法是从同一个泛型方法定义创建的，则该 方法将 为这两个方法返回相同的对象。If two constructed methods are created from the same generic method definition, the method returns the same object for both methods. 如果在 已表示泛型方法定义的上调用，则它将返回当前 。If you call on a that already represents a generic method definition, it returns the current . 如果泛型方法定义包含声明类型的泛型参数，则会有特定于每个构造类型的泛型方法定义。If a generic method definition includes generic parameters of the declaring type, there will be a generic method definition specific to each constructed type. 例如，请考虑以下 c #、Visual Basic 和 c + + 代码：For example, consider the following C#, Visual Basic, and C++ code: ``` class B {} class C { public B M() {...}} Class B(Of U, V) End Class Class C(Of T) Public Function M(Of S)() As B(Of T, S) ... End Function End Class generic ref class B {}; generic ref class C { public: generic B^ M() {...}; }; ``` 在构造类型中 `C` (`C(Of Integer)` Visual Basic) 中，泛型方法 `M` 返回 `B` 。In the constructed type `C` (`C(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the generic method `M` returns `B`. 在开放类型中 `C` ， `M` 返回 `B` 。In the open type `C`, `M` returns `B`. 在这两种情况下， 属性将返回 `true` 表示的 `M` ，因此 可以在两个 对象上调用。In both cases, the property returns `true` for the that represents `M`, so can be called on both objects. 对于构造类型，调用的结果 是 可调用的。In the case of the constructed type, the result of calling is a that can be invoked. 对于开放类型， 无法调用返回的。In the case of the open type, the returned by cannot be invoked. 有关特定于泛型方法的术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for terms specific to generic methods, see the property. 有关泛型反射中使用的其他术语的固定条件列表，请参见 属性。For a list of the invariant conditions for other terms used in generic reflection, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个具有泛型方法的类和获取方法的所需的代码 ，将方法绑定到类型参数，并从绑定方法获取原始泛型类型定义。The following code example shows a class with a generic method and the code required to obtain a for the method, bind the method to type arguments, and get the original generic type definition back from the bound method. 此示例摘自为方法提供的一个更大的示例 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the method. [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MethodInfo.Generics#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MethodInfo.Generics/VB/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Reflection.MethodInfo MakeGenericMethod (params Type[] typeArguments);

span.span: Substitutes the elements of an array of types for the type parameters of the current generic method definition, and returns a object representing the resulting constructed method.

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此成员是方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating that this member is a method.

value.span: 一个 值，指示此成员是方法。

span.span: A value indicating that this member is a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将重写 。This property overrides . 因此，在检查一组对象时（ 例如，由返回的数组）， 仅当给定成员为方法时，属性才会返回。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects - for example, the array returned by - the property returns only when a given member is a method. 若要获取 `MemberType` 属性，请首先获取类 `Type` 。To get the `MemberType` property, first get the class `Type`. 从中 `Type` 获取 `MethodInfo` 。From the `Type`, get the `MethodInfo`. 从中 `MethodInfo` 获取 `MemberType` 。From the `MethodInfo`, get the `MemberType`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示指定成员的类型。The following example displays the type of the specified member. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含有关方法的返回类型的信息（例如返回类型是否具有自定义修饰符）。

span.span: Gets a object that contains information about the return type of the method, such as whether the return type has custom modifiers.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含有关返回类型的信息。

span.span: A object that contains information about the return type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编译器设计器可以使用 此属性返回的对象来发现自定义修饰符（如 ）是否已应用于返回类型。Compiler designers can use the object returned by this property to discover whether custom modifiers, such as , have been applied to the return type.

span.span: This method is not implemented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关的详细信息 `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames` ，请参阅 MSDN library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
